text: Near clear golden orange with a small off white head. Aroma of cereal, citrus, grassy notes and malt. Flavour is light moderate sweet and above moderate bitter. Light medium bodied with soft carbonation.
From a 50 cl bottle. Pours a hazy copper with an off white head. Aroma of caramel. Flavors of bitter citrus. Bitter finish.

50cl bottle from a trade with Cuso, many thanks! Pours clear pale golden colour with a mid-sized most good lasting white head. Aroma of mild grainy malt, grassy hops, citron. Taste of intense bitter hops, citron, citrus, mild grainy malt, pale malt, long bitter finish.

On tap at Steinplatz, Bratislava. 
Gorgeous ale, cannot say much on aroma because of heavy pub atmosphere (rating based on others) but taste is excellent. Well balanced, very drinkable, bitterness is just enough. Im seriously considering with staying with this one for tonight instead of adding others to my portfolio.
Draft at Steinplatz. Strong white head, peachy aroma, clear yellow colour. Gentle hoppy taste, lightly citrus flavour, lasting malty bitter taste. Very good light ale, recommended.

Bottle from Cuso, thx 2016-12-29 Göteborg 
AR: citrus, lime leaves Angelica: like a Thai smoke
AP: hazy coppery, wee frothy white head
F: ripe fruity, dry, lime leafes,

Bottled, thanks Cuso!  Hazy golden, rich head. Striking dank aroma of sweaty peach and grapefruit. Dry with light body and crisp mouthfeel. Hop forward with peach and grapefruit. Long bitter finish. Excellent!

0.5l bottle. Hopy aroma, citruses, grassy, light pine. Hazy golden color, white head. Bitter hopy taste, very pleasant. Light body, watery texture, soft carbonation and dry bitter finish. Easy drinkable, good.

Bottle, thanks Cuso! Clear deep golden liquid with medium off-white head. Aroma of citrus, tangerine, light banana, mango, bread and light grain. Taste is very light sweet and medium bitter with notes of citrus, tangerine and bread. Light to medium bodied with medium to high carbonation. Drinkable. Tasty! Dry and hoppy. Tame golde.
On tap at Stupavar. Pours orange, medium white head. Some hops in aroma, bit fruity, citrus, malty, sweetish, bitter finish. Medium bodied. Probably not the freshest one.

On tap at Komunal pub Stupava. Clear golden color with white head. Aroma strong citrusy. Taste is with sour fruity tones and strong bitter from beginning. And in the end is hoppy storm. Surprisingly strong tastes for 11%. Maybe it could be less bitter from beginning, but still very good.

On tap. Pours is golden clear with thick off-white head. Aroma of pine and resin, some fruity and floral notes as well. Taste is moderate to medium bitter, piney mouthfeel. Medium body, slick texture, long bitter finish. Very drinkable.
bottle. hazy golden with mid sized head. Aroma: citrus-tangerines, resins, yeast. Taste: resins, citrus, mango. High pleasant bitterness, light body, oily texture.

Draught @ Le Senk, Bratislava, Slovak Replublic. Pours light golden with a white head. Aroma of malt, grassy hops, some bitter citrus, lemonpeel. Flavor is light bitter, malt, grassy, bitter citrus, light pine. Thin to medium body, average carbonation, dry and light bitter finish. Refreshing. 130816
Tap at 100 piv, orange color, stable white head. Aroma is nice hoppy, citrusy, light earthy, piney. Taste is solid malty, citrusy, piney, easy drinkable, medium hoppy finish
On tap at brewpub. Pours bit hazy orange color, white head. Aroma is citrusy, grapefruit, pines, tangerines. Taste is medium bitter, lightly sweet, malty, citrusy, grapefruit, orange, tangerines.

0,3 l hana @ Stupavar Beer Pub Bratislava. Lähes kirkas kullankeltainen. Tuoksussa saippuaisen sitruksista humalaa, hedelmää, litsiä ja persikkaa. Onpa hemmetin hyvää! Jännän pehmeä ja melkein maksan makuinen (!) ja kuitenkin humaloitu, sitruksinen ja hedelmäinen. Mallasta myös, ehkä sekoitan maltaan maksan makuiseksi? Maistelun myötä maksaisuus hälvenee, muuttuu leipäisemmäksi.

From tap at Stupavar Beer Pub, Pours light cloudy golden liquid, medium frothy white head, Aroma: tropical fruit, litchi, mango, Taste: fruity, mango citrus, litchi, tangerine, Palate: light body, average carbonation, slick mouthfeel, Overall: very good, very drinkable, enjoyed.
On tap, Stupavar beer pub. Hazy golden/orange colour with short lasting white head. Aroma citrus fruits, tangerine, orange, pine. Taste hops, bitter, piny, citrusy. Good one.

Tap at Stupavar. Hazy golden to orange colour. Aroma and taste both quite intensely hoppy, slightly garlicy, mosaical, tropical fruits. High carbonation helps the easy drinkability and helps the hops flavour come out. Maltiness subdued, bitterness above moderate. Long dry fruity finish. Very good.

Výčap Stupava Pivo Fest. Mútnejia tmavo ltá farba, biela pena. Vôňa výrazne kvasnicová, jemne citrusová. V chuti sladovosť, výrazná kvasnicová chuť a v pozadí citrusové tóny. Ľahie telo, niia nasýtenosť. Ete by si asi pivo potrebovali troku doleať. Piteľné, osvieujúce.

Tap at Stupavar beer pub. Hazy orange color with medium white head. Nice hoppy aroma with orangest, zest, pines. Nice citrus hoppy bitter taste with tangerines, orange zest, pines. Long hoppy bitter finish. Tasty.
